alert.note: Alert for Greater Pickens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 22 at 9:08AM EST until December 24 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM FRIDAY TO 9 AM EST SATURDAY BELOW 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE...Greater Pickens County. * WHEN...From 7 PM Friday to 9 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory means that very cold air and strong winds will combine to generate low wind chills. This will result in frost bite and lead to hypothermia if precautions are not taken. If you must venture outdoors, make sure you wear a hat and gloves.
